item.title: Early extreme contradictory estimates may appear in published research: The Proteus phenomenon in molecular genetics research and randomized trials
item.description: John PA Ioannidis, Thomas A Trikalinos “Early extreme contradictory estimates may appear in published research: The Proteus phenomenon in molecular genetics research and randomized trials” (2005) // Journal of Clinical Epidemiology. Publisher: Elsevier BV. Vol. 58. No 6. Pp. 543–549.
